Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
1/18 2:36PM - Yet another stellar day here at Stratton! After picking up 8 inches of fresh snow yesterday along with access to 574 acres of skiable terrain, today was one for the books! Lucky for you, long weekend fun continues into Martin Luther King Jr. Day on 90 open trails. Our grooming team will be out all night with a plan to lay down fresh corduroy on 70 trails. For your way up, 13 lifts are scheduled to spin at 8:30AM, with the possibility of wind delays as forecasted winds pick up throughout the day. Plus, early access is on for 7:45AM for First Tracks pass holders. 

Snow showers are on the radar once again for not only tonight, but for the next several days, with many chances for more snow accumulation. Don't stop those snow dances just yet! Temperatures are expected to remain cold for the foreseeable future allowing snowmaking to continue all week long. Additionally, resurfacing operations and expansion into Sun Bowl are in the works and lets just say we are already stoked for what's to come next weekend!

Ill catch up with you bright and early for your morning Report!

The park scene is looking lively with a freshly cut 13-foot Halfpipe open and firing on East Byrnes Side with 6 features ready to ride. Tyrolinne is also open with 7 features to keep the park laps rolling. 

Its National Safety Month, and it is dedicated to promoting skier and rider responsibility and mountain safety. Learn more about the code on the NSAA site to keep yourself and others safe on the mountain. Plus, if you see a ski patroller or safety patroller, give them a high five for their hard work and dedication to the mountain. 

Safety Tip: Never duck a rope. They are there for a reason.

MLK Weekend is here and the schedule is stacked with events. Strattons serving up something for everyone with extended lift hours, snowshoeing adventures, mountain activities, unique dining experiences, live music, aprs, and more. Join us and make the most of the holiday weekend. Cant wait to see you here!

Join Quiver and access premium skis at top resorts with no hassle; just the right gear for the right conditions. Reserve 24 hours in advance at skiquiver.com and use our limited time Stratton Exclusive code, Quiver30 for 30% off any Quiver product (seasonal membership, pay-as-you-go membership, and daily rate). Your skis will be waiting slopesidepickup details will be provided prior to your trip.

Discover the thrill of skiing or snowboarding with Stratton Mountain's Learn to Ski or Ride Program. This step-by-step program is designed to help you master the slopesand reward you with a 25/26 Stratton Select Pass, to ride out the rest of the season, upon completion.

Looking to progress this season? Strattons Camps and Clinics offer targeted skill development, expert coaching, and a strong sense of community for skiers and snowboarders. From womens programs to freestyle, snowboard, and advanced clinics, each offers a supportive, goal-focused environment to help you make the most of the season, with programs offered all throughout the winter. 

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
